availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thompson Ward (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Solomon Ward and Nancy A. Ward. Married to Phelin S. Blevins Ward on March 13, 1852. Father of Joseph Ward, Martin Ward, Marvin Ward, Lewis Ward, Colista Ward, Martha Ward, and Nancy Ward. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as private from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
